data.name: value
data.description: Defines the value of the radio button when selected.

data.name: size
data.description: Controls the size of the radio button. Available options: "sm", "md", "lg", "xl".

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Determines the animation speed for state changes. Options: "none", "normal", "fast", "slow".

data.name: reset
data.description: If set to true, removes all default styles, allowing full customization.

data.name: labelClasses
data.description: Custom classes for styling the label. Inherits from the parent Form component if available.

data.name: wrapperClasses
data.description: Additional classes for styling the main wrapper of the radio button.
